about_the_game:
Resttore is an open world action adventure game with survival mechanics where you play as Sashi, a masked figure with no memory who wakes up in an unknown place and has to help its inhabitants to restore peace and harmony.

EXPLORE

Explore a fantastic open world full of secrets, puzzles, enemies and charismatic characters.

FIGHT

Defeat all kinds of dangerous and not so dangerous enemies to create a safer place for you and others.

CRAFT

Gather useful resources to create better items that help you complete your objectives.

BUILD

Build your own house to take shelter from the dangers of the night and prepare for future challenges.

RELAX

Enjoy the beautiful views and experience side activities and mini-games of all kinds.
